=Installation=


To install the package, do the following.
  # untar the package:
{{{
tar -zxvf batmethxxxx
}}}
  # change to installation directory batmetxxxx
{{{
cd batmethxxxx
}}}
  # Configure and Install
{{{
      ./configure
      make
      make copy
}}}

=Building Indexes.=


Three sets of indexes needs to be built. They are built by calling build_index as follows.
  # build_index Base_Name GTOA
  # build_index Base_Name CTOT

1) will turn all G's to A's and build an index with the base name Base_Name-GtoA
2) will turn all C's to T's and build an index with the base name Base_Name-CtoT

To build the required indexes and delete unwanted files run the script Build_All

=Mapping=


To map the data set METH to the genome with base name GENOME do,
{{{
batmeth -g GENOME -i METH -n <number of mismatches> -o <Output_File>
split <Output_File> GENOME <number of mismatches> y <Final_result>
}}}
